alertQuery: ADFSandboxActivityRun | where Status == "Succeeded" | project Status, ActivityName, ResourceId | extend resourceName = split(ResourceId, '/')[-1] | where resourceName == "DF-POCADF-DEV" | summarize metricval=count() by Status
